$
$
$
About Us
/$
$
Shrouded in mist on a damp and utterly dreary night many years ago, Infinite Abyss founder Erynn Dalton devised a plot... to create unique, original horror for the droves of craven fanatics who desired a bloody "cut" above the ordinary. From that devious plan emerged Infinite Abyss Productions, a horror-themed theater and entertainment company comprised of South Florida's best talent.
Beyond special events, theater and film, Infinite Abyss Productions creates and executes unique live performances. This includes movie pre-shows, festivals, haunts, private events, story telling, genre conventions and more.
/$
/$
$
$
Contact Us
/$
$
The Team
/$
$
The Infinite Abyss team is a mix of horror genre creators and industry experts, as well as marketing and content creation specialists who blend together beautifully to present unique, viral experiences that audiences won't soon forget.
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Erynn Dalton
Founder, Artistic Director
/$
$
Erynn's experience is deeply-rooted within the horror genre, starting first as a performer, and then opening her own live horror theater in South Florida that has established a large cult following. Today, she serves as Artistic Director for the company, and also produces and directs Infinite Abyss's feature films., including
The Gravedigger
(2019),
Big Easy Queens
(2023) and
Kindling
(2024). Dalton has also had the pleasure of serving on the jury for two of her favorite genre film festivals, Popcorn Frights Film Festival and SIN Film Festival.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Joseph Zettelmaier
Development Director, Staff Writer
/$
$
Joseph Zettelmaier is a Michigan-based playwright and four-time nominee for the Steinberg/American Theatre Critics Association Award for best new play
All Childish Things
(2006),
Language Lessons
(2007),
It Came From Mars
(2010) and D
ead Man's Shoes
(2012). Joseph is known for his critically-acclaimed genre-focused plays such as
The Gravedigger, The Man Beast
and
Campfire
. Joseph works with Infinite Abyss in developing new projects and penning shows for Abyss's engagements.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Christopher Pinto
Marketing & Branding Specialist
/$
$
Christopher Pinto is a writer, musician, director, and an award-winning advertising creative professional. His marketing and advertising background goes back 30 years, being the principal creative decision maker for everything from local theater to multi million-dollar companies. For over 10 years he owned and spearheaded Stardust Productions, the largest mystery theater company in the Atlantic City, NJ area, where he honed his directing and acting skills, as well as learned the ins and outs of marketing in the entertainment business.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Jason Hignite
Communications, Industry Liaison
/$
$
Jason has over 40 years of live-performance experience (bands, choirs, theater) and 15 years of filmmaking experience (producing and acting). Most of these experiences have been within the horror genre. He also has over 15 years of experience facilitating horror film festivals and has been published in HorrorHound Magazine, Rue Morgue Magazine, and Movie Maker Magazine. His experience as a journalist has included horror movie reviews, horror movie news, and interviews with horror personalities.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Chris Bare
Technical Director
/$
$
Chris has been with Infinite Abyss since it's inception in 2014. He keeps the lights and audio going for each and every show!
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$

Event Cinema
/$
$
/$
$
Infinite Abyss takes movie-going to a whole new level with custom themed pre-show performances. Give movie lovers a reason to come back to the cinema by offering them a truly unique experience! We can design custom interactive and immersive pre-shows, atmospheric elements and other tailor-made details that will enhance the experience of any film, help your film screening, film festival or film premiere go viral and put butts back into movie theater seats!
​
If you'd like to learn more about how we can help you create a truly memorable experience for your film event, click the button below to get in touch!
/$
$
Contact Us
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
